item.title: Best practices for OIN apps
item.description: Best practices for OIN apps Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: OIN best practices. Why is this here?: - At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: Best practices and use cases Best security practices for the app specific guidelines for each app Internal Workshop: When asked “What prevents devs from being successful on the OIN, respondents answered: Best practices for Multi-tenancy Structure type: Concept

item.title: Use cases for OIN integrations
item.description: Use cases Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Why is this here?: - At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: - Best practices and use cases - Docs on use case scenarios - Use cases - Use case flows Use cases were consistently the most sought after docs
